 2024-00222024-01-19PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of KATHRYN BERGE of Victoria, British Columbia, to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of KATHRYN BERGE of Victoria, British Columbia, to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
